nodes.text: Darth Nihilus' holocron was a Sith holocron made by Darth Nihilus.
During the Cold War, the Sith Vaverone Zare attempted to lay claim to this artifact at the Lightspring on Tatooine whilst the Jedi Nariel Pridence attempted to prevent her from retrieving the relic.
By 137 ABY, the holocron had fallen into the hands of Darth Krayt, who used it to contact the Sith Lord on Korriban.
